certificate_preview_description: This document certifies the authenticity of the creative process
no_certificates_description: You haven't issued any certificates yet. Start by creating a new project.
adjust_search_filter: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
certificate_not_found_description: The certificate you're looking for doesn't exist.
certificate_description: This certificate demonstrates mastery in documenting creative processes using digital tools and platforms. The recipient has successfully completed a comprehensive creative session with step-by-step documentation, progress tracking, and final artwork completion.
criteria_1: Complete a full creative session from concept to final artwork
criteria_2: Document each step of the creative process with photos
criteria_3: Upload and organize progress photos to S3 storage
criteria_5: Maintain detailed session logs and descriptions
